FeaturesShowcase.title: Powerful Features

FeaturesShowcase.multiSourceDesc: Access 20+ premium stock sites including Shutterstock, Adobe Stock, Freepik, and more with a single subscription.

FeaturesShowcase.backgroundRemovalDesc: Instantly remove backgrounds from any image with our AI-powered tool. Perfect for product photos and marketing materials.
FeaturesShowcase.downloadHistoryDesc: Keep track of all your downloads with a comprehensive history. Re-download previous content anytime, anywhere.
FeaturesShowcase.localPricingDesc: Special pricing for Egypt, UAE, and KSA. Pay in your local currency with transparent, competitive rates.
FeaturesShowcase.flexiblePaymentDesc: Choose between pay-per-download or monthly subscriptions. Switch plans anytime to match your usage patterns.
FeaturesShowcase.ctaDescription: Join thousands of creators who trust Creo for their creative needs. Start your free trial today.

FAQAccordion.title: Frequently Asked Questions
FAQAccordion.subtitle: Find answers to common questions about Creo's features, pricing, and services.
FAQAccordion.accountCreationQuestion: How do I create an account?
FAQAccordion.accountCreationAnswer:
Creating an account is simple and free! Click the 'Sign Up' button on our homepage, enter your email address, and verify your account through the confirmation email. You can also sign up using your Google or Facebook account for faster registration.

Once registered, you'll receive 2 free credits to explore our platform and start downloading content immediately.
FAQAccordion.creditsExpirationAnswer:
Credits purchased through our pay-per-download plan never expire, so you can use them whenever you need them. However, free trial credits expire after 30 days if not used.

For our Professional plan subscribers, unused downloads don't roll over to the next month, but you can always upgrade or purchase additional credits as needed.
FAQAccordion.paymentMethodsQuestion: What payment methods do you accept?
FAQAccordion.paymentMethodsAnswer:
We accept all major payment methods including:
• Credit and debit cards (Visa, Mastercard, American Express)
• PayPal
• Bank transfers for larger amounts
• Local payment methods for Egypt, UAE, and KSA

All payments are processed securely through encrypted channels, and we never store your payment information on our servers.
FAQAccordion.subscriptionExtensionsAnswer:
Yes! You can extend your Professional subscription at any time. Simply go to your account settings and select 'Extend Subscription' to add more months to your current plan.

We also offer discounts for longer subscription periods - save 10% on 3-month plans and 20% on annual subscriptions.
FAQAccordion.aiUsageQuestion: How does AI image generation work?
FAQAccordion.aiUsageAnswer:
Our AI image generation tool uses advanced machine learning algorithms to create unique images based on your text descriptions. Simply describe what you want to see, and our AI will generate high-quality images in seconds.

You can specify style, colors, composition, and other details to get exactly what you need. All generated images are royalty-free and can be used commercially.
FAQAccordion.moneyBackGuaranteeQuestion: Do you offer a money-back guarantee?
FAQAccordion.moneyBackGuaranteeAnswer:
Yes! We offer a 7-day money-back guarantee for all new Professional plan subscribers. If you're not completely satisfied with our service within the first 7 days, contact our support team for a full refund.

This guarantee doesn't apply to pay-per-download credits, as they can be used immediately and don't expire.
FAQAccordion.downloadLimitsAnswer:
For pay-per-download users, you can download as many items as you have credits for. Professional plan subscribers get unlimited downloads from all supported platforms.

There are no daily or monthly limits on the number of downloads, and you can access content from all 20+ premium stock sites we support.
FAQAccordion.platformSupportAnswer:
We support 20+ premium stock platforms including:
• Shutterstock
• Adobe Stock
• Freepik
• Getty Images
• Unsplash
• Pexels
• And many more!

With a single Creo subscription, you get access to millions of high-quality images, videos, and graphics from all these platforms.
FAQAccordion.ctaDescription: Can't find what you're looking for? Our support team is here to help you 24/7.

TestimonialsCarousel.title: What Our Users Say
TestimonialsCarousel.subtitle: Real stories from creators across the Middle East who trust Creo for their creative needs.
TestimonialsCarousel.testimonial1Content: Creo has completely transformed my workflow. I used to spend hours searching across different stock sites, but now I have everything in one place. The AI image generation feature is incredible - I can create exactly what I need in seconds.
TestimonialsCarousel.testimonial2Content: The localized pricing for the UAE is fantastic. I'm paying in AED and the rates are much better than international platforms. The background removal tool has saved me so much time on product photos.
TestimonialsCarousel.testimonial3Content: As a creative director, I need access to diverse, high-quality content. Creo gives me everything from Shutterstock to Adobe Stock in one subscription. The download history feature is perfect for managing our team's assets.
TestimonialsCarousel.testimonial4Content: The pay-per-download option is perfect for freelancers like me. I only pay for what I use, and the credits never expire. The quality of content is outstanding, and the Arabic support makes everything so much easier.

PricingRollback.title: Points Rollback Policy
PricingRollback.subtitle: Understand how your unused points are handled when payments are due
PricingRollback.compactDescription: Unused points roll over if you pay within 3 days after due date
PricingRollback.detailedSubtitle: Learn about our flexible points management system that protects your investment
PricingRollback.policyDescription: We understand that sometimes you might miss a payment deadline. That's why we offer a 3-day grace period for unused points to roll over to your next billing cycle, ensuring you don't lose your investment.
PricingRollback.keyPoint1: 3-day grace period after payment due date
PricingRollback.keyPoint2: Unused points automatically roll over if payment is made within grace period
PricingRollback.keyPoint3: Points reset to zero if payment is not made within 3 days
PricingRollback.rollbackDescription: If you make your payment within 3 days after the due date, all your unused points will automatically roll over to your next billing cycle. This ensures you don't lose your investment in unused credits.
PricingRollback.resetDescription: If payment is not received within 3 days after the due date, all unused points will be reset to zero. This policy helps maintain fair usage across all users.
PricingRollback.step1Description: Your monthly payment is due on the same date each month
PricingRollback.step2Description: You have 3 days to make your payment after the due date
PricingRollback.step3Description: Points either roll over (if paid) or reset (if unpaid)
PricingRollback.warningDescription: Please ensure your payment method is up to date to avoid losing your unused points. We'll send you reminders before the grace period expires.
PricingRollback.footerNote: This policy applies to all subscription plans. For questions, contact our support team.

FAQFriendly.title: Frequently Asked Questions
FAQFriendly.subtitle: Got questions? We've got answers! Find everything you need to know about Creo in our friendly FAQ section.
FAQFriendly.noResultsDescription: Try adjusting your search terms or browse different categories to find what you're looking for.
FAQFriendly.ctaDescription: Can't find what you're looking for? Our friendly support team is here to help!
FAQFriendly.accountCreationQuestion: How do I create a Creo account?
FAQFriendly.accountCreationAnswer: Creating your Creo account is super easy! Just click the 'Sign Up' button on our homepage, enter your email address, and create a secure password. We'll send you a verification email to confirm your account. Once verified, you can start exploring our amazing collection of stock media right away! No credit card required for signup.
FAQFriendly.switchingPlansQuestion: Can I switch between different subscription plans?
FAQFriendly.switchingPlansAnswer: Absolutely! You can upgrade or downgrade your plan at any time. If you upgrade, you'll get immediate access to the new features and your billing will be prorated. If you downgrade, the changes will take effect at your next billing cycle. We make it super flexible so you can choose what works best for your needs!
FAQFriendly.paymentOptionsQuestion: What payment methods do you accept?
FAQFriendly.paymentOptionsAnswer: We accept all major credit cards (Visa, Mastercard, American Express), PayPal, and bank transfers. For our Middle Eastern users, we also support local payment methods like Fawry, Vodafone Cash, and STC Pay. All payments are processed securely through our trusted payment partners, so your financial information is always protected.
FAQFriendly.pointsRollbackQuestion: What happens to my unused points if I miss a payment?
FAQFriendly.pointsRollbackAnswer: Great question! We understand life happens, so we offer a 3-day grace period after your payment due date. If you pay within those 3 days, all your unused points will automatically roll over to your next billing cycle. However, if payment isn't received within the grace period, unused points will reset to zero. We'll send you friendly reminders before this happens!
FAQFriendly.aiImageGenerationQuestion: How does the AI image generation feature work?
FAQFriendly.aiImageGenerationAnswer: Our AI image generation is powered by cutting-edge technology that creates unique, high-quality images based on your text descriptions. Simply describe what you want (like 'a sunset over mountains' or 'a modern office space'), and our AI will generate several options for you to choose from. It's like having a personal designer available 24/7! The generated images are yours to use commercially.
FAQFriendly.creditsExpirationAnswer: Your credits don't expire as long as your subscription is active! However, if you cancel your subscription or miss a payment (beyond our 3-day grace period), any unused credits will be forfeited. We recommend using your credits regularly to get the most value from your subscription. Think of it as 'use it or lose it' - but we'll always remind you before anything expires!
FAQFriendly.downloadLimitsQuestion: Are there any download limits on my plan?
FAQFriendly.downloadLimitsAnswer: It depends on your plan! Our Pay Per Download plan lets you buy credits as needed with no monthly limits. Our Professional plan includes a generous monthly allowance of downloads. If you need more, you can always purchase additional credits. We believe in giving you the flexibility to download as much as you need for your projects!
FAQFriendly.platformSupportQuestion: Which stock media platforms do you support?
FAQFriendly.platformSupportAnswer: We're proud to support over 20 premium stock media platforms! This includes big names like Shutterstock, Adobe Stock, Freepik, Unsplash, Pexels, and many more. With one Creo subscription, you get access to millions of high-quality images, videos, and graphics from all these platforms. It's like having a universal key to the world's best stock media!
FAQFriendly.moneyBackGuaranteeQuestion: Do you offer a money-back guarantee?
FAQFriendly.moneyBackGuaranteeAnswer: Yes! We're so confident you'll love Creo that we offer a 30-day money-back guarantee. If you're not completely satisfied with your subscription within the first 30 days, just contact our support team and we'll refund your payment, no questions asked. We want you to feel confident trying our service!
FAQFriendly.teamCollaborationQuestion: Can my team collaborate on projects using Creo?
FAQFriendly.teamCollaborationAnswer: Absolutely! Our Professional plan includes team collaboration features that let you share downloads, manage team credits, and work together on projects. You can invite team members, set permissions, and even track who downloaded what. It's perfect for agencies, marketing teams, or any group that needs to work together on creative projects!
